title: Chunk 2
summary: Cells that require lots of energy, like muscle cells and nerve cells, have many mitochondria. In fact, some cells can have hundreds or thousands of mitochondria. ### Endoplasmic Reticulum (ER) The endoplasmic reticulum is an extensive network of membranes that extends throughout the cytoplasm. **Types**: 1. **Rough ER**: Has ribosomes...
